it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Interface Replicating


  • public interface Replicating
    The observable interface offers methods listening object replications by means of ReplicationListener. The class that is interested in processing a replication event implements the ReplicationListener interface, and the object created with that class is registered with an object instance of a class implementing the Replicating interface using registerReplicatingListener method. An helper for implementing this interface is provided by ReplicationListenerContainer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isListenerRegistered(ReplicationListener listener)
      Checks if the given listener is registered.
      void registerListener(ReplicationListener listener)
      Registers the given replication listener with the replicating instance.
      boolean unregisterListener(ReplicationListener listener)
      Unregisters the given replication listener.
